filmography.title: Somebody Up There Likes Me
filmography.role_description: A young street thug and associate of Rocky Graziano in one of McQueen's earliest uncredited film appearances.
filmography.plot: Biopic of middleweight boxing champion Rocky Graziano, detailing his rise from a life of crime to success in the ring.

filmography.title: Never Love a Stranger
filmography.role_description: A Jewish orphan who rises to become a powerful gangster in 1912 New York.
filmography.plot: A young man befriends a Catholic boy in an orphanage and grows up to become a crime boss.

filmography.title: The Blob
filmography.role_description: A teenager who tries to warn his town about a consuming alien entity; McQueen's first major leading role.
filmography.plot: An alien lifeform consumes everything in its path as it grows and grows.

filmography.title: The Great St. Louis Bank Robbery
filmography.role_description: A college dropout and getaway driver who gets caught up in a doomed heist.
filmography.plot: A gang of robbers plans a heist on a bank in St. Louis, but internal tensions and police intervention threaten the job.

filmography.title: Never So Few
filmography.role_description: A resourceful corporal in WWII Burma who catches the eye of Frank Sinatra's captain.
filmography.plot: An American captain leads a band of guerilla fighters in Burma during World War II.

filmography.title: The Magnificent Seven
filmography.role_description: A cool, drifting gunfighter who joins Yul Brynner to protect a Mexican village, stealing nearly every scene he is in.
filmography.plot: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

filmography.title: The Honeymoon Machine
filmography.role_description: A Navy lieutenant who uses a ship's computer to calculate roulette outcomes in Venice.
filmography.plot: Three men use a navy super computer to beat the roulette wheel at a Venice casino.

filmography.title: Hell Is for Heroes
filmography.role_description: A rebellious, anti-social soldier whose reckless bravery is needed to hold a defensive line against the Germans.
filmography.plot: A squad of US soldiers must hold off a German company for 48 hours until reinforcements arrive.

filmography.title: The War Lover
filmography.role_description: An arrogant B-17 pilot who loves the thrill of combat more than anything else, alienating his crew.
filmography.plot: During World War II, a reckless bomber pilot and his co-pilot clash over a woman and the pilot's dangerous behavior.

filmography.title: The Great Escape
filmography.role_description: A rebellious American POW who repeatedly attempts escape and performs a legendary motorcycle jump.
filmography.plot: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.
filmography.awards: Moscow International Film Festival: Win – Best Actor

filmography.title: Soldier in the Rain
filmography.role_description: A conniving supply sergeant who worships a smarter, older sergeant played by Jackie Gleason.
filmography.plot: A sergeant and his idol, a master sergeant, navigate life on a peacetime military base.

filmography.title: Love with the Proper Stranger
filmography.role_description: A carefree musician who must face responsibility when a one-night stand results in pregnancy.
filmography.plot: A young woman tracks down a musician she had a fling with to tell him she is pregnant, and they try to raise money for an abortion.

filmography.title: Baby the Rain Must Fall
filmography.role_description: A paroled convict and aspiring rockabilly singer whose violent temper threatens his family.
filmography.plot: A woman travels with her young daughter to a small Texas town to reunite with her husband, who has just been released from prison.

filmography.title: The Cincinnati Kid
filmography.role_description: An up-and-coming poker player who challenges the reigning master in high-stakes Depression-era New Orleans.
filmography.plot: An up-and-coming pool player plays a long-time champion in a single high-stakes match.

filmography.title: Nevada Smith
filmography.role_description: A half-Indian cowboy who embarks on a brutal, years-long quest for vengeance against the men who killed his parents.
filmography.plot: A mixed-race cowboy sets out to avenge the death of his parents at the hands of three outlaws.

filmography.title: The Sand Pebbles
filmography.role_description: A rebellious naval engineer on a gunboat in 1920s China who questions authority and racial prejudice; his only Oscar-nominated role.
filmography.plot: An engineer on a U.S. Navy gunboat in 1926 China creates tension with his independent nature and respect for the locals.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actor; Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actor (Drama)

filmography.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
filmography.role_description: A bored, wealthy tycoon who orchestrates a perfect bank heist for the thrill and engages in a cat-and-mouse game with an investigator.
filmography.plot: A debonair, adventuresome bank executive believes he has pulled off the perfect bank robbery, only to match wits with a sexy insurance investigator.

filmography.title: Bullitt
filmography.role_description: A cool, determined San Francisco police lieutenant who protects a witness and engages in cinema's most famous car chase.
filmography.plot: An all-guts, no-glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.

filmography.title: The Reivers
filmography.role_description: A mischievous handyman who takes his boss's young grandson and a new car on a joyride to Memphis.
filmography.plot: A young boy, a handyman, and a black stowaway take a car for a joyride to Memphis in 1905.

filmography.title: Le Mans
filmography.role_description: A professional race car driver competing in the grueling 24 Hours of Le Mans; a passion project for McQueen.
filmography.plot: During the 24 Hours of Le Mans in France, a champion auto racer returns to the track that nearly killed him a year before.

filmography.title: Junior Bonner
filmography.role_description: An aging rodeo star who returns home to Prescott, Arizona, seeking one last triumph and reconnection with his family.
filmography.plot: An aging rodeo rider returns to his hometown to compete and connect with his family, finding that time has moved on.

filmography.title: The Getaway
filmography.role_description: A master thief released from prison who goes on the run with his wife after a bank heist goes wrong.
filmography.plot: A recently released ex-convict and his loyal wife go on the run after a heist goes awry.

filmography.title: Papillon
filmography.role_description: A French convict sentenced to Devil's Island who is obsessed with escaping, forming a bond with a counterfeiter.
filmography.plot: A man befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence on a dreadful prison island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

filmography.title: The Towering Inferno
filmography.role_description: A heroic fire chief who battles a massive blaze in a San Francisco skyscraper and clashes with the architect.
filmography.plot: At the opening party of a colossal, but poorly constructed, office building, a massive fire breaks out, threatening to destroy the tower and everyone in it.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Cinematography; Oscar: Nomination – Best Picture

filmography.title: An Enemy of the People
filmography.role_description: A heavily bearded, intellectual doctor who becomes a pariah for exposing contaminated water in his town; a rare departure from his action image.
filmography.plot: A scientist stands against his town when he discovers their medicinal spa water is polluted.

filmography.title: Tom Horn
filmography.role_description: A legendary frontiersman hired to stop cattle rustling who finds himself framed and abandoned by the changing West.
filmography.plot: A renowned former army scout is hired by ranchers to hunt down rustlers but finds himself fighting for his life when they turn on him.

filmography.title: The Hunter
filmography.role_description: Based on the real-life bounty hunter who tracks down fugitives while dealing with his own aging and impending fatherhood; McQueen's final film.
filmography.plot: The true story of Ralph 'Papa' Thorson, a modern-day bounty hunter who tracks down bail jumpers.
